committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution noting the retirement of Joel W. Solomon, and expressing gratitude for his contributions as a public servant.

summary.text: Honors and expresses the gratitude of the House of Representatives to a named individual at the time of his retirement from the position of Administrator of the General Services Administration.

titles.title: A resolution noting the retirement of Joel W. Solomon, and expressing gratitude for his contributions as a public servant.
